creator: sherwoodskogen95

title: Setting up NEW Thunderbird
content: I have had quite a problem with my Thunderbird account for months and I have not been able to send any emails on my Computer - this seemed to be to do with the Setting for outgoing emails. I was missing '465' and I have now learnt that by seeing it in my NEW Account which just popped up in front of me??? I did the set up, and it seemed to be going OK, however, I only have a Deleted Items and Junk Folder, with absolutely NO CONTACTS. After doing some reading up, apparently I should have an update bar at the bottom right hand corner - NO. Now the Icon seems to have disappeared as well. So I can no longer look at the NEW account. Simply fixing my OLD email account by (possibly) adding '465' into Port section of the STMP Server page would be good. Wow, YES, it now allows me to use my OLD account to SEND an email - Yeehaa! HOWEVER, I cannot download new emails. So, on my Computer, the latest email coming IN is dated 12/01/2025. My emails DO come in to my iPad, so I am not totally missing out, however ALL of my Historical Emails which are VITAL to keep due to legal repercussions, are on my Computer and I am no longer able to add items to those folders. Desperate Jenny
creator: jennysadlier20

title: stampa pagine in bianco

title: How to change colour of font for unread mail in Thread pane?
content:
Would you like all unread incoming emails to stand out better and use a different coloured font ? If using 'threaded' view, would you like a collapsed thread to indicate it has unread mail by displaying Bold and White (if using Dark mode)?

Read the information below to help you use 'userChrome.css' and tailor make your own Thunderbird.
creator: Toad-Hall

title: "No message found" on additional accounts
content:
Hello.

I have just downloaded Thunderbird for the purpose of importing .mbox file from Google Takeout. It worked with the ImportExportTools NG add-on.

Since I liked the app, I decided to add my other e-mail accounts. The initial account I added looks to be working as intended.

However, on all of the other accounts, which are outlook.com and hotmail.com accounts, "No messages found" is said on the inbox and they are all essentially dead. The login process worked fine and so on, but then nothing happens. I've tried to look at the various settings, but I can't figure it out. It's all the same as the main account, to my eye.

I am on Mac Sequoia 15.3.2.

Thanks for any feedback.
creator: kknnwwllcc
